detail_desc: Jersey top with a motif on the front, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with side pockets and wide elastication with a drawstring at the waist. The cotton content of the shorts is organic.
Espadrilles in cotton with a braided jute trim around the soles and concealed elastic at the back of the heels. Fabric linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Short dress in a soft, chunky knit with a polo neck, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Jacket woven in a cotton blend with a collar and drawstring hood with a foldover edge and small peak. Zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front and long raglan sleeves. Chest pocket, flap front pockets and a flap sleeve pocket, all with hook and loop fastenings, an adjustable tab with a hook and loop fastening at the cuffs, and a drawstring at the hem. Lined.
Fitted, V-neck top in a sturdy, ribbed cotton blend. Long sleeves with slits at the cuffs.

Set with a short-sleeved cotton piqué polo shirt and pair of soft shorts. Polo shirt with a ribbed collar, button placket and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back. Shorts with elastication at the back of the waist, a fake fly with a button, side pockets, a fake welt back pocket with a button, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

Oxford cotton shirt with a button-down collar, classic front and open chest pocket. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, a yoke with a pleat and hanger at the back and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Off-the-shoulder top in viscose jersey with elastication at the top and decorative buttons at the front. Long raglan sleeves with elastication at the cuffs and an elasticated hem with a flounce.
Lined balconette bikini top with underwired, padded cups that lift and shape the bust. Silicone trim at the hem, detachable, adjustable shoulder straps, side support and a metal fastener at the back.
Sleeveless, circular dress in woven fabric with buttons at the back, a decorative bow at the front and gathered seam at the waist for added width and soft draping. Lined at the top.

Sleeveless sports bodysuit in fast-drying functional fabric with a high neckline at the front and low-cut back. Lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back. The polyester content of the bodysuit is recycled.
Metal and plastic earrings in various designs.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a reversible sequin motif on the front (size 2-3Y with normal sequins) and narrow ribbing around the neckline.
Triangular scarf in a soft, felted wool and cashmere blend with fringing along the bottom edge. Size 100x200 cm.
Necklaces in various types of thin metal chain, one with leaf-shaped pendants. Adjustable length 40-54 cm.
Boxer shorts in cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front. The cotton content of the boxer shorts is organic.
Henley shirt in cotton jersey with a button placket and long sleeves with a tab and button.
Trousers in narrow-wale cotton corduroy with an elasticated drawstring waist and back pocket with a fabric appliqué, Jersey lining.
5-pocket jeans in superstretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs.
Fitted top in ribbed cotton jersey with a V-neck and a seam down the front.
Jumper in a soft, fine-knit cotton and silk blend with long sleeves and a ribbed neckline.
Hoodie in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a lined, drawstring hood, gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Fishnet socks with wide elastic at the top.
Short skirt in crinkled chiffon with an elasticated waist and small frill trim at the top. Lined.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a round neckline and a print motif.
Wide top in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Non-wired thong body in soft microfibre designed with the minimum number of seams for a seamless, comfortable feel against the skin. Adjustable shoulder straps and padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Concealed ribbed trim under the bust and a lined gusset.
Bodysuit in soft cotton jersey with a lace collar and press-studs at the back of the neck. Long, puff sleeves with elastication at the cuffs, and press-studs at the crotch.
Sports shorts in fast-drying mesh with an elasticated drawstring waist and short slits in the hems.
Soft nursing tops in organic cotton jersey with narrow adjustable shoulder straps. Soft integral top with an elasticated hem and functional fastening for easier nursing access.
Shorts in an airy cotton weave with an adjustable, elasticated waist and pleats at the front. Fake fly and press-stud, side pockets and fake welt back pockets.
Sleeveless, calf-length dress in soft jersey made from a cotton blend. High slit in one side.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cashmere with a deep V-neck, long dolman sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets. Narrow, decorative piping down the legs and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.

5-pocket shorts in soft, stretch cotton denim with hard-worn details. Adjustable, elasticated waist (except in sizes 12-14+Y), a zip fly and button and lace-trimmed hems with short slits in the sides.
Short jacket in corduroy with metal buttons. Collar, buttons down the front, flap chest pockets with a button, side pockets, buttoned cuffs and an adjustable tab and button at the sides. Unlined.
Short shorts in stretch twill with a regular waist and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
High-waisted, ankle-length trousers in stretch jersey with concealed elastication at the waist, a visible zip at the back and slim legs.
Fully lined swimsuit with a deep V-neck front and back and narrow shoulder straps that cross at the back.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs on one shoulder and at the crotch.
V-neck T-shirts in organic cotton jersey.
Jumper in a soft knit with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Ankle-length jeans in washed denim with a high waist, detachable belt with metal D-rings and a zip fly. Relaxed fit with side and back pockets, and tapered legs. The jeans are made partly from recycled cotton.
Ankle-length trousers in stretch cotton twill with a high waist, zip fly and button, back pockets and slim legs.
Wide, V-neck jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Pull-on trousers in washed cotton twill. Relaxed fit with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, a fake fly, low crotch and diagonal side pockets. Legs with shaping darts at the knees and covered elastication at the hems.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a wrapover, jersey-lined hood, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with padded cups and wide, lightly padded, adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back. Extra elastic straps at the back for maximum support and an elastic hem with hook-and-eye fasteners. Extra firm support.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined, drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved tops in soft cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y).
Flip-flops with fabric straps and fluted rubber soles.
Belt with a metal buckle. Width 2.5 cm.
Calf-length dress in an airy viscose weave with a collar and buttons down the front. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, a seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Fine-knit jumper in a soft viscose blend with a round neck, dropped shoulders, long, tapered sleeves and a straight-cut hem with slits in the sides.
Calf-length sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with wide ribbing at the waist for a comfortable fit.

Shirt in premium cotton poplin with a cutaway collar and French front. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, a yoke at the back, and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.

Jacket in woven fabric with a filling of 80% down and 20% feathers. Stand-up collar with a drawstring, a zip down the front, discreet pockets in the side seams, dropped shoulders and covered elastication at the cuffs. Seam with a drawstring at the waist. Lined.

Calf-length dress in glitter-print mesh with a flounce at the top that also forms short sleeves. Opening with a button at the back of the neck and an elasticated seam at the waist. Short jersey underdress with narrow shoulder straps.
Top in airy jersey crêpe with a V-neck, short cap sleeves and a small stand-up collar with gathers at the back of the neck.
Gently fitted jacket in a soft linen and viscose weave with wide notch lapels, a fastening with one button at the front and jetted front pockets. Lined.

V-neck blouse in a jacquard weave with a wrapover front with a concealed button, hook-and-eye fastening and narrow ties at the side. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, a seam at the waist and a gently flared peplum.

Calf-length dress in airy, crinkled chiffon decorated with plastic beads. Round neck with an opening and button at the back, long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs and a gently flared, tiered skirt. Short satin underdress with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
Vest tops in soft cotton jersey with a scalloped trim around the neckline and armholes.
Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with a mesh racer back, lightly padded cups with removable inserts and a wide elasticated hem. Extra firm support.
Knee-length shorts in woven fabric with a high waist, pleats at the top and a zip fly with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener. Side pockets and wide legs.
Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with a racer back in ventilating mesh and a wide elasticated hem. Medium support.
Treggings in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Pyjamas in soft, organic cotton jersey. Long-sleeved tops with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y) and ribbed cuffs. Bottoms with covered elastication at the waist and ribbed hems.
Double-layered hat in a soft, fine knit. Turn-up at the hem with a small appliqué on the front.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waistband.
Cardigan in a soft knit with long sleeves, slits in the sides and no buttons.

Short-sleeved shirt in woven fabric with a matching bow tie. Shirt with a collar, buttons down the front, a yoke with a pleat at the back, chest pocket, sewn-in turn-ups on the sleeves, and a rounded hem. Pre-tied bow tie with an adjustable elastic strap and plastic fastener at the back.
Trousers in airy modal twill. Elasticated waist with a small frill trim, zip fly and button and patch front pockets. Loose, relaxed-fit legs with wide elastic at the hems.
Tops in soft slub cotton jersey with short puff sleeves, concealed press-studs on one shoulder, a scalloped trim around the neckline and cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Short, fitted top in ribbed cotton jersey with short sleeves.

department_name: Sneakers small girl inactive from s2
detail_desc: Trainers with elasticated lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Cotton canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles.

Shirt in woven fabric with an easy-iron finish. Turn-down collar, classic front and darts and a yoke at the back. Long sleeves, narrow cuffs with adjustable buttoning, and a rounded hem. Slim Fit – a fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Purse with a zip around three sides. Four card compartments, one note compartment and a small, zipped coin compartment. Size 2x10x11.5 cm.
